com.webobjects.eoapplication Provides application logic utility classes to the client side of Java Client applications.

Subclasses of EOApplication.ApplicationSupport in com.webobjects.eoapplication

          EOApplicationSupport is an EOApplication.ApplicationSupport subclass used with two-tier Swing/EOF applications.
